DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to assess the effect of spironolactone on interstitial fibrosis in kidney transplant recipients receiving calcineurin inhibitors
DOC.brief_title: Spironolactone and Prevention of Calcineurin Inhibitor Toxicity in Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Kidney Failure Age > 18 Kidney transplant recipients Patients taking angiotensin receptor blockers or inhibitors of the angiotensin reconverting enzyme Kidney transplant performed more than one month from enrollment in the study Hyperkalemia (K> 5.5 meqL)
DOC.keyword: Focus of the study is to assess if aldosterone blockade has an effect on interstitial fibrosis amongst kidney transplant recipients
